tool_description: Analyzes customer interaction patterns, purchase behaviors, and engagement metrics to provide insights into product performance from a customer perspective.

product_ids.description: Products to analyze customer behavior for

customer_segments.description: Specific customer segments to focus on

behavior_metrics.description: Specific metrics to calculate: views, clicks, purchases, returns, reviews

error_messages: Invalid analysis period: analysis_period_days must be between 1 and 365.
Unknown customer segments: One or more customer segments are not recognized.
Invalid behavior metrics: Use combinations of [views, clicks, purchases, returns, reviews].
Insufficient data: Not enough customer interaction data for meaningful analysis.
Product IDs not found: One or more product IDs do not exist in the customer behavior database.
usage: Specify product_ids and analysis_period_days, optionally filter by customer_segments and select specific behavior_metrics. Set include_demographics to true for demographic insights.

conversion_funnel.description: Conversion funnel data from views to purchases

repeat_purchase_rate.description: Percentage of customers making repeat purchases
